## 🧭 Objective:  
Investigate the relationship between political instability and development indicators in Latin America.

## ✍️ Prompt:   
Do higher conflict levels correlate with lower development outcomes? What exceptions exist?

## 📥 Load Data
```{r}
latin <- read_csv("assets/datasets/latin_america_conflict.csv")

library(GGally)
ggpairs(latin[, c("conflict_index", "gdp", "education_spending")])
```
